# stop()

**Instance Method**

Stops the audio engine and releases any previously prepared resources.

## Declaration

```swift
func stop()
```

## Discussion

This method stops the audio engine and the audio hardware, and releases any allocated resources for the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEngine/prepare()] method. When your app doesn’t need to play audio, consider pausing or stopping the engine to minimize power consumption.

## Playing Audio

- **prepare()**: Prepares the audio engine for starting.
- **start()**: Starts the audio engine.
- **isRunning**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio engine is running.
- **pause()**: Pauses the audio engine.
- **reset()**: Resets all audio nodes in the audio engine.
- **musicSequence**: The music sequence instance that you attach to the audio engine, if any.
